body_html:
Agreed on both cases; i'm still ignorant enough of the codebase to know at what points (if any) protobuf is unavoidably used in the TF code and so could not practically be avoided by TF consumers.

Will still spend some time this weekend in probing and gedankenexperiment WRT (2.)
